answers.author: [Unknown]
answers.text:
Zabihullah, you can access this link: http://icma.org/en/icma/members/join/join_now
to process your membership.  
The dues rate for Afghanistan membership is $70 US.  
As for finance information, the easiest way to find that content here on the Knowledge Network is to navigate to the topics tab.  You should also edit your Knowledge Network profile (found on the top right of screen).  Within edit profile, navigate to the interests and groups tab.  Select the Finance and Budget and Financial Management topics.  Then, if you want to receive e-mail notifications of new content, you can switch on e-mail notifications within the preferences tab.

author: Unknown
text:
Respecful sir/madam1
Accept my kind regards and best wishes.
I work as admin/Finance assistant in ICMA/CAWSA suboffice in afghanistan. i am realy interested to be an active member of ICMA international.i ask respecful authority of ICMA Int'l help me use and get benifits if it is didecated. for my capacity building i would like to get admin and finance upate information from you,i have got B.Sc diploma in economics from afghanistan, i am interested you to provide oppurtunity for me to use some scholarships for improving my knowledge in my academic field.
Thanks
Sincerely yours
Zabihullah 'Behroz"
Admin/Finance assistant
USAID-ICMA/CAWSA
Ghazni office
Email add: zbehroz@icma.org
                  zabehroz@gmail.com
                  zabi.behroz@hotmail.com

title: Wilingness to be active member of icma
